Qualifications required: Lower Primary (Class-5th) Examination; proficiency in Odia language; sound health, physique, and good moral character; no criminal record
Skills required: Computer, Driving, Cooking, Electrician, Plumber, Barber, Cobbler, Carpenter, Tailor, AC mechanic, or other trades (choose one)
Mode of application: Offline submission at District Home Guard Office, RO, Keonjhar
Contact details: Office of the Commandant Home Guards, Keonjhar
